#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

	int n;
	int m;
	int h;
	int s[1004];

	double ans;
	int total;
	int ts;
	int t;


	ts = 0;

	scanf("%d", &n);
	scanf("%d", &m);
	scanf("%d", &h);

	for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
		scanf("%d", s + i);
		total += s[i];
	}

	s[h]--;
	total--;
	n--;

	t = total;
	ts = total - s[h];

	int i = (ts - n) + 1;
	int j = (t - n) + 1;
	
	ans = 1;

	while(i <= ts) {
		ans = ans * (double)(i) / (j);
		i++;
		j++;
	}
	
	printf("%0.6lf\n", ans);

}
